content.rendered:
The 2020 American Society of Cataract and Refractive Surgery has been cancelled due to recommendations from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the World Health Organization (WHO), the Massachusetts Department of Public Health (DPH), and the City of Boston.

We will still be offering ASCRS discounts on all of our products during the time of the show, and will be holding our raffle remotely for a chance to win free products and even bigger discounts.

excerpt.rendered:
TTI Medical remains open at this time to continue serving our customers. We are doing everything we can to ensure our workplace and the products we ship are clean and safe.

The 2020 American Society of Cataract and Refractive Surgery has been cancelled due to recommendations from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the World Health Organization (WHO), the Massachusetts Department of Public Health (DPH), and the City of Boston.

We will still be offering ASCRS discounts on all of our products during the time of the show, and will be holding our raffle remotely for a chance to win free products and even bigger discounts.
